TopicTitle: Any mods like Active Texture Management for 1.2.2

Articles.Content: Any mods like Active Texture Management for 1.2.2? I can't find any that are for 1.2.2, so if you know of one please tell me whats it called.
That mod is now defunct. It worked by compressing the textures to a different format, which is now the default texture format in 1.2.2, so there's no need for it anymore.

Indeed, Active tecture management is bit of history, For as far as I know, it already was 'useless' since 1.1.3. 
KSP has already included 'the best' way to compress textures so they aren't as heavy as in earlier versions of KSP.  
Also, texture management was optional when you have quite a bad GPU, nowadays, stock KSP doesn't use that much GPU, mostly CPU and RAM. And the visual mods do have the optimal textures for loading now.
Alright, just wanted to see if there was anything like it for my loading time. (I have probably close to if not over 50 mods lol) Thanks for the answers!

For reducing loading time you can run your game in openGL mode or force DX11. 
And just 50 mods? those are rookie numbers, keep them up.

1 hour ago, DrLicor said:

For reducing loading time you can run your game in openGL mode or force DX11. 
And just 50 mods? those are rookie numbers, keep them up.  

I tried openGL already, it caused huge fps drops every ~30 seconds, I'll try force DX11.
Wait what? FPS drops with openGL? that's strange. DX11 is a bit more aggresive than opengl. So expect more visual bugs etc.
